item.title: Health Issues Stack Up In Houston As Harvey Evacuees Seek Shelter
item.description: August 29, 2017 - With thousands of people displaced, health workers are trying to address the immediate medical needs of evacuees as well as mental health issues made worse by the disaster.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: August 29, 2017 - With thousands of people displaced, health workers are trying to address the immediate medical needs of evacuees as well as mental health issues made worse by the disaster. http://www.npr.org/sections/health-shots/2017/08/29/547027763/health-issues-stack-up-in-houston-as-harvey-evacuees-seek-shelter

item.title: Epic Floods — Not Just In Texas — Are A Challenge For Aid Groups
item.description: August 29, 2017 - Two weeks before Hurricane Harvey struck, monsoon rains swamped Bangladesh, India and Nepal. Aid groups are struggling to deal with both disasters.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: August 29, 2017 - Two weeks before Hurricane Harvey struck, monsoon rains swamped Bangladesh, India and Nepal. Aid groups are struggling to deal with both disasters. http://www.npr.org/sections/goatsandsoda/2017/08/29/547002884/epic-floods-not-just-in-texas-are-a-challenge-for-aid-groups

item.title: For Navajos, Desert 'Tea' Fosters Kinship With Heritage And Nature
item.description: August 29, 2017 - Some Navajo are trying to bring back their traditional food culture, including drinking Navajo "tea." It's brewed with a plant called greenthread that thrives in the mid-summer heat of the Southwest.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: August 29, 2017 - Some Navajo are trying to bring back their traditional food culture, including drinking Navajo "tea." It's brewed with a plant called greenthread that thrives in the mid-summer heat of the Southwest. http://www.npr.org/sections/thesalt/2017/08/29/546817827/for-navajos-desert-tea-fosters-kinship-with-heritage-and-nature

item.title: Syringe Exchange Program Aims To Slow Hepatitis C Infections In Alaska
item.description: August 29, 2017 - As the nation's opioid abuse problem soars, so do health problems associated with drug use like hepatitis C, which is placing a major burden on Alaska's Medicaid program.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: August 29, 2017 - As the nation's opioid abuse problem soars, so do health problems associated with drug use like hepatitis C, which is placing a major burden on Alaska's Medicaid program. http://www.npr.org/sections/health-shots/2017/08/29/547054395/syringe-exchange-program-aims-to-slow-hepatitis-c-infections-in-alaska

item.title: How Moldy Hay And Sick Cows Led To A Lifesaving Drug
item.description: August 29, 2017 - The blood thinner warfarin, which prevents blood clots, owes its existence to some cows who got very sick after eating spoiled hay — and to a chemist who spent years trying to figure out why.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: August 29, 2017 - The blood thinner warfarin, which prevents blood clots, owes its existence to some cows who got very sick after eating spoiled hay — and to a chemist who spent years trying to figure out why. http://www.npr.org/sections/health-shots/2017/08/29/531749974/how-moldy-hay-and-sick-cows-led-to-a-life-saving-drug

item.title: Holistic Therapy Programs May Help Pain Sufferers Ditch Opioids
item.description: August 29, 2017 - Learning strategies to deal with chronic pain can be an effective way to stay off addictive medicines, says the head of the Mayo Clinic's pain rehab center. But insurance doesn't always cover it.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: August 29, 2017 - Learning strategies to deal with chronic pain can be an effective way to stay off addictive medicines, says the head of the Mayo Clinic's pain rehab center. But insurance doesn't always cover it. http://www.npr.org/sections/health-shots/2017/08/29/546145817/holistic-therapy-programs-may-help-pain-sufferers-ditch-opioids

item.title: Stay Safe And Get A Tetanus Shot, Texas Health Officials Urge
item.description: August 28, 2017 - Texas public health officials are looking ahead to meeting health needs in the days and weeks ahead, including getting prescriptions to people displaced to shelters.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: August 28, 2017 - Texas public health officials are looking ahead to meeting health needs in the days and weeks ahead, including getting prescriptions to people displaced to shelters. http://www.npr.org/sections/health-shots/2017/08/28/546781492/stay-safe-and-get-a-tetanus-shot-texas-health-officials-urge

item.title: FDA Cracks Down On Stem-Cell Clinics Selling Unapproved Treatments
item.description: August 28, 2017 - The companies are "unscrupulous actors" marketing stem-cell treatments that have not been proved effective and may be dangerous, the FDA says. It took action against clinics in Florida and California.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: August 28, 2017 - The companies are "unscrupulous actors" marketing stem-cell treatments that have not been proved effective and may be dangerous, the FDA says. It took action against clinics in Florida and California. http://www.npr.org/sections/health-shots/2017/08/28/546719842/fda-cracks-down-on-stem-cell-clinics-selling-unapproved-treatments

item.title: Need A Happiness Boost? Spend Your Money To Buy Time, Not More Stuff
item.description: August 28, 2017 - A recent study suggests that when people spend their extra cash to get help with time-consuming chores, they're likelier to feel better than if they use the money to buy more things.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: August 28, 2017 - A recent study suggests that when people spend their extra cash to get help with time-consuming chores, they're likelier to feel better than if they use the money to buy more things. http://www.npr.org/sections/health-shots/2017/08/28/545839192/need-a-happiness-boost-spend-your-money-to-buy-time-not-more-stuff

item.title: Serious Nursing Home Abuse Often Not Reported To Police, Federal Investigators Find
item.description: August 28, 2017 - Despite legal requirements, more than one-quarter of cases of severe abuse that were uncovered by government investigators were not reported to the police. The majority involved sexual assault.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: August 28, 2017 - Despite legal requirements, more than one-quarter of cases of severe abuse that were uncovered by government investigators were not reported to the police. The majority involved sexual assault. http://www.npr.org/2017/08/28/546460187/serious-nursing-home-abuse-often-not-reported-to-police-federal-investigators-fi

item.title: Red Cross Update On Hurricane Harvey Relief Efforts
item.description: August 27, 2017 - NPR's Michel Martin speaks with Brad Kieserman, the Red Cross vice president of disaster operations and logistics, who is running the Harvey relief efforts.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: August 27, 2017 - NPR's Michel Martin speaks with Brad Kieserman, the Red Cross vice president of disaster operations and logistics, who is running the Harvey relief efforts. http://www.npr.org/2017/08/27/546603340/red-cross-update-on-hurricane-harvey-relief-efforts

item.title: What The Public Is Saying About Miscarriage In 140 Characters
item.description: August 27, 2017 - Miscarriage, while widely experienced, is not often discussed in public. Researchers have turned to social media to see what people are saying about the topic and how much they're choosing to share.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: August 27, 2017 - Miscarriage, while widely experienced, is not often discussed in public. Researchers have turned to social media to see what people are saying about the topic and how much they're choosing to share. http://www.npr.org/sections/health-shots/2017/08/27/542809414/what-the-public-is-saying-about-miscarriage-in-140-characters

item.title: What's Making These Dogs In Mumbai Turn Blue?
item.description: August 26, 2017 - Five dogs with this unusual hue were found in an industrial area of Mumbai. The hunt for its cause revealed a much bigger problem.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: August 26, 2017 - Five dogs with this unusual hue were found in an industrial area of Mumbai. The hunt for its cause revealed a much bigger problem. http://www.npr.org/sections/goatsandsoda/2017/08/26/546049293/whats-making-these-dogs-in-mumbai-turn-blue

item.title: Having A Best Friend In Your Teenage Years Could Benefit You For Life
item.description: August 26, 2017 - Researchers have found that people with deep friendships in adolescence had less anxiety and a greater sense of self-worth in early adulthood. Close friends matter, their study found.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: August 26, 2017 - Researchers have found that people with deep friendships in adolescence had less anxiety and a greater sense of self-worth in early adulthood. Close friends matter, their study found. http://www.npr.org/sections/health-shots/2017/08/26/543739986/having-a-best-friend-in-your-teenage-years-could-benefit-you-for-life

item.title: 4 Steps That Could Cut Health Insurance Premiums And Boost Enrollment
item.description: August 25, 2017 - For now, the Affordable Care Act remains the law of the land. A consulting firm lays out four steps it says would lead to insurance coverage for millions more, at a lower cost.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: August 25, 2017 - For now, the Affordable Care Act remains the law of the land. A consulting firm lays out four steps it says would lead to insurance coverage for millions more, at a lower cost. http://www.npr.org/sections/health-shots/2017/08/25/546141203/four-steps-that-could-cut-health-insurance-premiums-and-boost-enrollment
